channel.title: Little help?
channel.description:
I am not too sure if this is the right section for this, but I will ask anyway.
A while ago, I had a Modem, which was all good with hosting, then we got a router, so we had a modem AND a router.. everything was good, I portforwarded correctly, everything worked to plan.. then we got rid of the Modem and upgraded our Router.
The problem is now, if I change the IP on my computer, my internet doesn't work.. yes we have a router, but all 3 computers run off the same IP.
I can't host any RSPS, I can't host any WC3 Bnet servers, and it is really getting to me... My uncle is a computer nerd, even he couldn't figure out how to do it, or how to fix it.
Any help?

item.title: Little help?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I wouldn’t have a clue, but I have a static IP, and I want to be able to host, it was fine ages ago when I had a modem router…

My router is Telstra Bigpond

Read full topic

item.title: Little help?
item.dc:creator: @beast_k0 beast k0
item.description:
@beast_k0 wrote:

Are you trying to set a Dynamic IP?

Whats your Router?

Read full topic

item.title: Little help?

A while ago, I had a Modem, which was all good with hosting, then we got a router, so we had a modem AND a router… everything was good, I portforwarded correctly, everything worked to plan… then we got rid of the Modem and upgraded our Router.
